name: Zero Proof: Rosewater and Lychee Mocktail
description: In small amounts, rosewater lends a subtle floral note to beverages. Rose goes particularly well with fruit, which is why we've paired it with lychee in this alcohol-free tipple. The lychee syrup is sweet, the lemon tart, and the rosewater fragrant, making for a drink that's both exotic and strangely familiar.

recipeInstructions.text: Open can of lychees and drain, reserving syrup. Put fruit aside to use as garnish.
Partially fill cocktail shaker with ice, and then add 1 cup lychee syrup along with lemon juice and rosewater. Shake for 20 seconds.
Pour into three cocktail glasses and top up with sparkling water. Add a lychee to the bottom of each glass and garnish with a rose petal.
